name: pl.apkd.medicine
description: Medicine is a high-performance Unity tooling package built on Roslyn source generators. It removes common MonoBehaviour and ScriptableObject boilerplate by emitting optimized code at compile time, with zero runtime overhead for unused features. Core features: - [Inject]: cached component references with debug-only validation and helpful diagnostics - [Singleton]: single active instance access for MonoBehaviours and ScriptableObjects - [Track]: fast registries of active instances with optional snapshots - Per-instance data aligned with tracked objects for Burst and the Job System access - Allocation-free component enumeration - Unity tag/layer constants generation - Analyzers and quick fixes for your IDE ...and many more tiny and big features - see the README.
